0.dialouge: Hellooo there Klay! and Hellooo there Malo! It's your favoriot teacher, Sir Sirrington!

1.dialouge: His intellect knows no bounds and his knowlege is vaster than the sea.

2.dialouge: The seas doesn't exist you nut job.

3.dialouge: God bless you Klay! It's nice to see that you haven't changed.

4.dialouge: I was worried that this selection might be getting to you.

6.dialouge: I have a few friends here who I think you might be interested in!

7.dialouge: They're wonderful fellows. They really are!

8.dialouge: They're fucking conspiracy theoriests aren't they.

9.dialouge: If you want to call them that, then yes. Make sure to talk to them when you run into them. They have alot to teach you!

10.dialouge: In that case, I hope I never meet them.

11.dialouge: You say that and yet you listen to my rantings.

12.dialouge: Weather you realize it more not, you're mind is craving the truth!

13.dialouge: Kids like you two would give me hope, for when the The Sneaking Cheating Lizard Men makes thier move!
